tool_description: Analyzes stylistic, technical, and historical evidence to assess and document artist attributions with confidence levels and supporting reasoning.

accession_number.description: Unique identifier of artwork being analyzed

proposed_artist.description: Artist name being considered for attribution

attribution_type.description: Type of attribution: definitive, attributed_to, circle_of, follower_of, after, manner_of, school_of

analyst_name.description: Name of curator or scholar conducting analysis

error_messages: Object not found: Accession number does not exist in collection database
Invalid attribution type: Must be one of [definitive, attributed_to, circle_of, follower_of, after, manner_of, school_of]
Empty artist name: Proposed artist name cannot be empty
Empty analyst name: Analyst name cannot be empty
Insufficient evidence: At least one type of evidence must be provided
Artist not in database: Proposed artist not found in authority records
usage: Systematically evaluate all available evidence for artist attributions. Consider stylistic, technical, and documentary evidence. Consult with other experts and compare with known works.

confidence_level.description: Confidence in attribution: very_high, high, moderate, low, speculative

supporting_evidence.description: Summary of evidence supporting the attribution

cataloging_recommendation.description: How attribution should appear in catalog records
